General.Name: McLaren Resources Inc
General.Description: McLaren Resources Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold properties in Canada. It holds a 100% interest in the McCool property covering an area of 1,650 hectares of mining leases located in the southern portion of McCool Township, Ontario; and the Kerrs property comprising 775 hectares located in Kerrs Township, Ontario. The company also holds a 100% interest in the Blue Quartz property, which consists of 25 patented mining claims covering approximately 640 hectares located in the Beatty Township, Northern Ontario; and the Augdome gold property that consists of 22 patented claims covering an area of 414 hectares located in Tisdale and Whitney Townships, Northeastern Ontario. McLaren Resources Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 44 Victoria Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1Y2
